item.title: Quick Question.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

case 555: if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now."); } else if (c.hasPaid == 0) { c.sendMessage("You need 500 Game Points to buy the ability of using this shop."); } else if (c.pcPoints >= 500) { c.pcPoints -= 500; c.hasPaid += 1; c.sendMessage("You now have ability to use this shop."); } else if (c.hasPaid == 1) { c.getShops().openShop(18); } else { c.sendMessage("You must first buy the ability to use this shop before using it!"); } break; Better?

item.title: Quick Question.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Why are you deleting 500 game points because then they cannot use it again. And there’s no need for the last else since there’s already an else at the top.

case 555: if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now."); } else if ((c.hasPaid == 0) && c.Gpoints <= 500) { c.sendMessage("You need 500 Game Points to buy the ability of using this shop."); } else if (c.Gpoints >= 500) { c.hasPaid += 1; c.sendMessage("You now have the ability to use this shop."); } else if (c.hasPaid >= 1) { c.getShops().openShop(18); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

case 555: if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now."); } else if (c.hasPaid == 0) { c.sendMessage("You need 500 Game Points to buy the ability of using this shop."); } else if (c.Gpoints == 500) { c.Gpoints -= 500; c.hasPaid += 1; c.sendMessage("You now have ability to use this shop."); } else if (c.hasPaid == 1) { c.getShops().openShop(18); } else { c.sendMessage("You must first buy the ability to use this shop before using it!"); } break;
Would this work, if a player needed 500 points to use a shop, once the players has 500 points, by clicking “trade” on the npc they will then have all perm. Access to the shop, and cannot access the shop until they pay the 500 points?

Read full topic
